title: provisions of the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous 

Provisions Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited work life balance miscellaneous provision act 2023 (commencement) order 2023

title: provisions of the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023
heading: 2. The 3rd day of July 2023 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 3rd day of July 2023 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 
(No. 8 of 2023) shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1; 

(b) Part 2, other than sections 7, 8, 12 (a), 13 and 14; 

(c) Sections 32 to 39. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 June, 2023. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [341] 3
